## Quality Assessment

**Data Quality**:
- [ ] Excellent - high resolution, minimal artifacts
- [ ] Good - suitable for archaeological analysis
- [ ] Fair - usable with limitations
- [ ] Poor - significant issues

**Known Issues**:
- [ ] Vegetation artifacts
- [ ] Water surface errors
- [ ] Processing artifacts
- [ ] Incomplete coverage
- [ ] Other:
